HOME.TITLE: Patient admission
HOME.INFO: Please fill this form before comming to the hospital to speed up your admission.

FORM.ANSWER_A_FEW_QUESTIONS: Please answer a few questions about your health.
FORM.INFORMATION_IS_SAFE: The information you enter is safe.
FORM.NO_DATA_IS_SENT_OVER_THE_INTERNET: No data is sent over the internet.

SUMMARY.YOU_HAVE_TO_ACCEPT_TXT: You have to accept the terms and you are telling the truth
SUMMARY.YOU_HAVE_TO_ACCEPT_BTN: You have to accept the terms

EMPLOYEE.WELCOME: Welcome to the employee application for the triage of patients
EMPLOYEE.TAP_SCAN_TO_BEGIN: Tap scan next patient to begin
EMPLOYEE.CONFIRM_AS_COVID_NON_SUSPECT: Confirm patient as COVID NON suspect

HOW_IT_WORKS.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This app is intended for people who are about to be tested for COVID-19. If you're going to the hospital, you can fill this form on your smartphone at home and take your phone to the hospital with you
HOW_IT_WORKS.FILL_FOR_OTHERS: [optinal] Fill form for other people who are comming with you
HOW_IT_WORKS.SHOW_QR_CODE_TO_STAFF: Show the QR code to the hospital staff

ABOUT.APP_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This application is designed to significantly speed up patient triage in hospitals and mobile test ambulances during COVID-19 testing.
ABOUT.TRIAGE_DESCRIPTION: Triage is the process of determining the priority of patients' treatments based on the severity of their condition or likelyhood of recovery with and without treatment
ABOUT.CREATED_ON_HACKATHON: This applicatin was created as a submission for the Hack Ko≈°ice Digital hackathon 2020.

PATIENT_QR_CODE.FOLLOW_INSTRUCTIONS: Follow the instructions of the hospital staff

SCAN_CONFIRMATION_QR_CODE.SCAN_CONFIRMATION_QR_CODE: Scan confirmation code from hospital employee

ALERT.DELETE_ALL_DATA: Delete all app data? This operation cannot be reversed.

LOGIN.ONLY_FOR_EMPLOYEES: This part of the application is only available for hospital employees.
LOGIN.ENTER_REGISTRATION_CODE: Enter registration code. If you don't have one, contact the person in charge of triage in your hospital.
LOGIN.CHECK_CONNECTION: Please check your connection, this feature is not available offline.

ERROR.server_error: Ups. Something went wrong. Try again later
